summary: Completed comprehensive testing of role-based access control system with Governor (super admin) functionality. All backend APIs (100% success rate) and frontend UI components working perfectly with proper authentication, role management, and permission-based access control.
passed_tests: Governor existence check GET /api/auth/check-governor
Governor registration POST /api/auth/register-governor with secret code GOV-MAJESTIC-2024
Governor login POST /api/auth/login authentication
Role creation POST /api/roles with auto-generated access codes
Role management (update, regenerate codes) functionality
Get roles list GET /api/roles
User registration with access code POST /api/auth/register
User login with access code as password
Get users list GET /api/users (governor permission)
Permission-based API access control (users restricted from unauthorized endpoints)
Invalid governor secret rejection (403 forbidden)
Invalid access code rejection (400 bad request)
Home page displays government emblem correctly
Login page has Вход and Регистрация tabs working
Registration tab shows access code field with proper placeholder text
Governor registration form (when no governor exists)
Admin panel loads for authenticated users
Role management section accessible to governor
Permission-based navigation (users only see allowed sections)
User with ministry permission can access ministries section
User without role permission cannot access roles section
Invalid access code shows proper error message in UI
Frontend-backend integration for complete auth flow
Auto-redirect to admin panel after successful authentication

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all UI components and role-based flows working)
